subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Some new additions for the 12-470... I hope

Yes, but only when the intuition hits to reverse a voice, or phrase. I don=
't use it on everything, but there is often a reverse component. 
 
 Frank-=
S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: orbhunterx@...: Mon, 3 Dec 2=
007 06:02:39 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Some new additions for the 12-470.=
.. I hope




What about reverse speech?Has anyone considered trying to use=
 this technique with voice recordings from the boxes? Lance--- In EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:>> > Well, I can te=
ll where that theory came from! It's been my experience, they use what we u=
se, as long as it's something they can form voices out of. It's also been m=
y experience that the combo noise/frag voice is what our own minds create. =
I suggest you play with EVPmaker, with clear raw audio, you'll find no whit=
e noise needed. > > I don't get any mention of technicians, or anykind of h=
elper/operators on the other side. They sometimes talk about a network, but=
 I couldn't tell you what that is, or if it's real. > > I think it's 99.99%=
PK. So not only do spirits, and other entities make voices, we can do it to=
, mostly unconciuosly. > > Moon is still certain that it has to be random, =
despite the last several months of experiments that show the linear mode is=
 far superior. > > If someone could take a digital speech recordng, stored =
in memory, and chop it up, and play it back over a speaker, I think it woul=
d work just as well as radio. You could get live voices, answers to questio=
ns, and never replace the raw audio. This is in fact EVPmaker, but it would=
 be nice to have it portable. EVPmaker pretty much took all the mystery out=
 of this, and it's all but igonred. My system, and analog version of EVPmak=
er using technologies I had worked wiht in the past. My mind did kind of as=
semble all the elements, so I got an image of the complete system. > > I th=
ought I knew how the voices in my boxes worked at one time..now I have no i=
dea!> > Frank-S> > > > > To: EVP-ITC@...: michaelcoletta@...: Mon, 3 Dec 20=
07 00:22:35 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Some new additions for the 12-470... I =
hope> > > > > Excuse me if I mispell some things in this post, I'm currentl=
y running the production board for a LIVE internet radion program going on =
right now, and I'm doing 100 things at once!Okay... According to some, "...=
the Spirit Technicians and Spirit Guides on the other side have repeatedly =
explained that the way that the Telephone to the Dead technology works, is =
by spirit energy manipulating the random voltage generator (RVG) and using =
white and pink noise, as well as radio fragment, to create real time voice =
answers to questions posed from our side. The most important aspect to this=
 device is the medium operator who works as an antenna or "interpreter" for=
 living individuals asking the questions."So, that said (or copied and past=
ed) I have decided that my next attempt with the older version of the 12-47=
0 will be the following:1) Add a method of variable voltage used to adjust =
the tuning circuit, similar to the RVG mentioned above. I went out and purc=
hased another older 12-470 today, to do just this.(Frank... I did some meas=
urements of that VT and found a range to work with.. I hope!)2) Add that wh=
ite or pink noise to be mixed with the sweeping raw audio already available=
 from the modified 12-470.3) Add an internal antenna for the 12-470.4) Add =
an interface so the user will be a active/passive part of the radio. As men=
tioned above, as the antenna between the entities/spirits.So... if I can ac=
complish all that... maybe the little ole' 12-470 will be recognized by the=
 "experts", as having what the big mahcines now have... :-)Wish me luck in =
my adventure... and oh, by-the-way... I hope to add all this, inside the ex=
isting case.- Mike > > > > > > > __________________________________________=
________________> You keep typing, we keep giving. Download Messenger and j=
oin the i'm Initiative now.> http://im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=
=3DTAGLM>
